DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# show ip igmp groups
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
#show ip igmp groups
Interface Address Group Mode Timer Srcs V Uptime Vlan301 33.33.33.1 232.1.1.1 ---- 00:00:03 1 2 00:00:02

DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# show ip igmp join
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: #show ip igmp join Interface Address Source Group Socket Uptime Ethernet8 * 90.0.0.2 232.1.1.1 15 00:00:07 Ethernet8 * 91.0.0.2 232.1.1.1 16 00:00:07

DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# show ip igmp interface Vlan301
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
Interface : Vlan301 State : up Address : 33.33.33.1 Uptime : 00:00:48 Version : 2
Querier ------- Querier : local Start Count : 0 Query Timer : 00:00:01 Other Timer : --:--:--
Timers ------ Group Membership Interval : 5s Last Member Query Count : 2 Last Member Query Time : 2s Older Host Present Interval : 5s Other Querier Present Interval : 4s Query Interval : 2s Query Response Interval : 1s Robustness Variable : 2 Startup Query Interval : 1s
Flags ----- All Multicast : no Broadcast : yes Deleted : no Interface Index : 185 Multicast : yes Multicast Loop : 0 Promiscuous : no

DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# show ip igmp sources
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
#show ip igmp sources
Interface Address Group Source Timer Fwd Uptime Vlan301 33.33.33.1 232.1.1.1 * 00:00:03 Y 00:00:02

DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic# show ip igmp sources
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: #show ip igmp statistics IGMP RX statistics Interface : global V1 query : 0 V2 query : 0 V3 query : 36 V2 leave : 0 V1 report : 0 V2 report : 0 V3 report : 74 mtrace response : 0 mtrace request : 0 unsupported : 0

COMMAND.name: clear ip igmp vrf
COMMAND.help: Clear IGMP for all interfaces for VRF

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to clear igmp. Following is a partial list of information with command syntax that can be cleared. - clear ip igmp vrf VRF-NAME interfaces This command clears all igmp in VRF VRF-NAME
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# clear ip igmp vrf default interfaces

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to clear igmp. Following is a partial list of information with command syntax that can be cleared. - clear ip igmp interfaces This command clears all igmp
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# clear ip igmp interfaces

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure IGMP.
